sentences.en: As the rain Blair's support, here is the verdant forest vegetation.
sentences.cn: 由于雅雨的滋润, 这里的林木植被十分的葱郁.

sentences.en: Children are playing on the verdant lawn.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在绿茵茵的草坪上嬉戏玩耍.

sentences.en: He travels through the lush and verdant landscape of the island.
sentences.cn: 他在岛上的一片青葱苍翠之中游历.

sentences.en: I saw some cows and ship grazing in the verdant pasture.
sentences.cn: 我看到一些牛羊在青翠的牧场上吃草.

sentences.en: Inside moist climate, abundant rainfall, verdant vegetation.
sentences.cn: 境内气候温润, 雨量充足, 草木葱郁.

sentences.en: Luxuriant and verdant , ho , whiffs of perfume assailing my nostrils.
sentences.cn: 葳蕤而蓊茏兮芳馨而醉鼻 ﹒.

sentences.en: On all sides , verdant sunset - bathed hills greet the eye.
Small children played happily in verdant parks.
sentences.cn: 小孩子们在满眼绿色的公园里快乐地玩耍.

sentences.en: The chaplain relished the privacy and isolation of his verdant surroundings.
sentences.cn: 牧师十分欣赏他那苍翠的环境所具有的幽雅恬静,与世隔绝的气氛.

sentences.en: The garden is covered with verdant grass.
The verdant mountain forest turns red gradually in the autumn wind.
sentences.cn: 苍翠的山林在秋风中渐渐变红了.

sentences.en: The wind whispered in the green pines and verdant cypresses.
The wind whispered in the green pines verdant cypresses.
sentences.cn: 风在苍松翠柏中发出飒飒声.

sentences.en: There is a verdant lawn in front of the dormitory.
sentences.cn: 宿舍前是绿茵茵的草坪.

sentences.en: We are singing in the verdant filed.
sentences.cn: 我们在绿色的田野上放声歌唱.

words.tran_cn: 青翠的；翠绿的；没有经验的；不老练的

trans.tran_cn: （草、田地等）翠绿的，嫩绿的，长满绿色植物的，无经验的
